Articles.Content:
I want zokiesia to build an army, let the others grind each other down, then smash any remnants. Or just clutter the orbitals essentially blockading kerbin's Polar and prograde orbits...

that's kind of malicious. right now I want peace, and Industrial growth.
And ferries lots of ferries.Planning on a transport network anyone wishing for movement via train,boat or large aircraft(costs a lot more) will be added to network plans.

And ferries lots of ferries.Planning on a transport network anyone wishing for movement via train,boat or large aircraft(costs a lot more) will be added to network plans.

for me, a high speed truck is best kind of transport, or riverboats for inter-country trade up and down Notillian River.
I don't have trains,they're fancy rovers.

Lets work together to build a debris field at lko that will stop anything getting past. MWHAHAHAA

Matt

ok- i missed a day so I'm adding another hex. I'm at three.

The town of Williamshaven

Touchdown proof (wieird angle i know sorry)

Map Update.

Those look cool I'll update when I get home to do so.

Oh you guys might want to design a ground military craft if you have not done so already. We will be hosting a cooperative war game session.

Fix
@Spartwo, I made an effective truck.

now just make one that can carry 2

Map updated please PM me if there are any irregularities. Also the war-game will be a peaceful demonstration and learning exorcise, specifics will be posted when i get them .

update

*Boop*

Edited November 12, 2013 by Spartwo

Ok finaly got it all updated sry i had to go through page by page and set up a system that i could keep track of on my computer and simply add to it. The max hexes until 0.0.2 comes out will be 7. Everyone is doing well, i love the designs. The upcoming war-game will include 6 light craft land, or air, and one medium craft, either naval, or land. Also look for my comments in red as they will be important. If you want me to pay close attention to something you say put it in blue. That way when things pick up even more i wont miss it.

Edited November 12, 2013 by camulus777
fixed

Landed my new Command Center on the east coast of the Great Planes added an airbase to it too.

Fixing

Built Nebulus Base. Current strength, One fighter, one Machine Gun, and One Light Attack PUMA.

map is up

Edited November 13, 2013 by zekes
Can your tank gun kill armored plate?

Can your tank gun kill armored plate?

the .5m HV missiles it carries can do damage sometimes, but that type of weapons is relegated to non-armor duties, even in space. All my armor peircing weapons are 1m.

so the answer is probably not. But it is good for killing kerbals (i tested it) and unarmed/wing paneled ships.

Again, it's a Light Attack Vehicle, meant for recon and skirmishes with Infantry and disruption of supply lines.

Basically it does what this does:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SdKfz_234

Edited November 13, 2013 by zekes
I see you have an armed FRAK-1. I love that plane flying, it was so much fun. It's very similar in performance but has 3 engines, and looks a bit different.
Is it necessary to get structures (non-vehicles) into place legit, or can they be edited in? I notice no one's things seem to have wheels or parachutes left from moving.

just the command center everything else is hyperedit though making a mobile base could be a good idea. If you see how the others choose their hexes and send a pic that is usually how you do it or you can go on KSP maps app and give me coordinates, ill try to pick the right hex from your PM. Also check out the other threads they have some other fun stuff too. Welcome to the game.

Like this?

Coordinates -2.4, 180.0
perfect. now every day you can launch another command center to claim a hex we will max out at 7 till 0.0.2 also check out the challenge thread the link is at the top with the rules.

Ok, That little spit of land is now ours!

Map:

We are also shipping now from Notilian to other nations, would anyone be willing to trade?

EDIT Ive also planned my first mun mission. Launch date is Thursday at 11:00PM GMT.

Pffft mun,I'm going to Duna.

Pffft mun,I'm going to Duna.

well, i'm gonna start small before I use some of the bigger ships. I'm gonna first put two men on the Mun, then go for Duna.
See ya there I've been planning a large mission for some time I made a CTV for the job.

This has two days worth of updates, I forgot to post yesterday
